spell.name: Firebolt
spell.description: Launches a bolt of fire at your enemy, dealing direct damage.

spell.name: Arcane Shield
spell.description: Creates a magical shield that reduces incoming damage for 5 turns.

spell.name: Minor Healing
spell.description: Heals some of your health.

spell.name: Frost Ray
spell.description: Shoots a beam of frost that deals damage and may slow the enemy.

spell.name: Arcane Blast
spell.description: Releases a burst of pure arcane energy.

spell.name: Nature's Touch
spell.description: Channels the power of nature to restore health over time.

spell.name: Shadow Strike
spell.description: A quick strike from the shadows that deals moderate damage.

spell.name: Lightning Jolt
spell.description: A quick bolt of lightning that deals damage.

spell.name: Earth Tremor
spell.description: Creates a small earthquake that damages the enemy.

spell.name: Mystic Insight
spell.description: Grants mystical insight, increasing spell power for a short time.

spell.name: Fireball
spell.description: Hurls a ball of fire that explodes on impact, dealing area damage.

spell.name: Ice Barrier
spell.description: Creates a barrier of ice that reduces damage and may freeze attackers.

spell.name: Rejuvenation
spell.description: A powerful healing spell that restores health and provides healing over time.

spell.name: Arcane Armory
spell.description: Surrounds the caster with arcane weapons that boost attack power and defense.

spell.name: Wind Blast
spell.description: Summons a powerful gust of wind that damages and pushes back the enemy.

spell.name: Venom Spray
spell.description: Sprays toxic venom that poisons the enemy, dealing damage over time.

spell.name: Thunderclasp
spell.description: Calls down a thunderous boom that deals heavy damage and may stun the enemy.

spell.name: Earth Shield
spell.description: Creates a shield of stone and earth that significantly reduces incoming damage.

spell.name: Lifedrain
spell.description: Drains life force from the enemy, healing the caster by half the damage dealt.

spell.name: Mana Steal
spell.description: Drains magical energy from the enemy, restoring mana to the caster.

spell.name: Inferno
spell.description: Engulfs the area in flames, causing massive fire damage and lingering burns.

spell.name: Frost Nova
spell.description: Releases a freezing wave that damages enemies and significantly reduces their action speed.

spell.name: Nature's Blessing
spell.description: Channels the full power of nature to provide substantial healing and restoration over time.

spell.name: Arcane Surge
spell.description: Channels pure arcane energy into a devastating blast that ignores magical defenses.

spell.name: Hurricane
spell.description: Summons a violent storm that deals damage over multiple turns and reduces enemy effectiveness.

spell.name: Earthquake
spell.description: Triggers a massive earthquake that deals substantial damage and destabilizes the enemy.

spell.name: Shadow Form
spell.description: Transforms the caster into living shadow, increasing evasion and spell power.

spell.name: Chain Lightning
spell.description: Unleashes a bolt of lightning that repeatedly strikes the enemy.

spell.name: Vitality Transfer
spell.description: Converts mana into health, providing substantial immediate healing.

spell.name: Mana Flux
spell.description: Creates a surge of magical energy that temporarily reduces spell costs and increases regeneration.

spell.name: Meteor Strike
spell.description: Calls down a devastating meteor that deals massive damage and leaves the area burning.

spell.name: Blizzard
spell.description: Summons a violent blizzard that deals severe cold damage and freezes enemies.

spell.name: Arcane Explosion
spell.description: Releases an explosive burst of arcane energy that deals massive damage to all enemies.

spell.name: Gale Force
spell.description: Summons a devastating windstorm that deals damage and severely reduces enemy capabilities.

spell.name: Earth's Embrace
spell.description: Envelops the caster in living stone, providing near-immunity to damage for a short time.

spell.name: Void Rift
spell.description: Opens a rift to the void, dealing extreme damage that bypasses defenses.

spell.name: Raging Thunderstorm
spell.description: Summons a violent thunderstorm that strikes multiple times with increasing intensity.

spell.name: Nature's Wrath
spell.description: Unleashes nature's fury in a devastating attack that also heals the caster.

spell.name: Mana Rejuvenation
spell.description: Rapidly restores mana and enhances mana regeneration for several turns.

spell.name: Phoenix Flame
spell.description: Envelops the caster in regenerative flames that provide substantial healing and damage resistance.

spell.name: Solar Flare
spell.description: Channels the power of the sun to create a devastating flare that causes catastrophic damage.

spell.name: Absolute Zero
spell.description: Reduces the temperature to absolute zero, causing extreme damage and completely freezing the enemy.

spell.name: World Shatter
spell.description: Creates a localized earthquake of such magnitude that it threatens to shatter the world itself.

spell.name: Tempest
spell.description: Conjures a catastrophic tempest of wind, lightning, and rain that devastates everything in its path.

spell.name: Arcane Singularity
spell.description: Creates an arcane singularity that warps reality and devastates anything in its vicinity.

spell.name: Divine Restoration
spell.description: Channels divine energy to completely restore health and remove all negative effects.

spell.name: Void Consumption
spell.description: Opens a rift to the void that consumes a portion of the enemy's essence, dealing damage and healing the caster.

spell.name: Elemental Fusion
spell.description: Fuses elemental energies to dramatically enhance spellcasting power and provide protection.

spell.name: Time Warp
spell.description: Warps the flow of time, allowing the caster to act twice in a single turn.

spell.name: Essence of Life
spell.description: Channels the pure essence of life, providing massive healing and ongoing regeneration.

spell.name: Apocalypse
spell.description: Summons the apocalypse, inflicting catastrophic fire damage and leaving the target in agony.

spell.name: Tsunami
spell.description: Summons a massive tsunami that crashes down on enemies, causing devastating damage and lingering effects.

spell.name: Colossal Eruption
spell.description: Triggers a massive volcanic eruption beneath the enemy, causing extreme damage and lingering volcanic effects.

spell.name: Supercell Storm
spell.description: Summons a massive supercell thunderstorm with multiple devastating effects.

spell.name: Reality Warp
spell.description: Tears apart the fabric of reality around the target, causing catastrophic arcane damage and disrupting their magic.

spell.name: Mind Control
spell.description: Takes control of the enemy's mind, forcing them to damage themselves with their own power.

spell.name: Phoenix Resurrection
spell.description: Channels the power of the mythical phoenix to restore the caster to full power and provide powerful regeneration.

spell.name: Time Reverse
spell.description: Reverses time around the caster, undoing recent damage and restoring mana and health to a previous state.

spell.name: Cosmic Shield
spell.description: Surrounds the caster with the power of the cosmos, providing near invulnerability and reflecting damage back at attackers.

spell.name: Planar Binding
spell.description: Binds the enemy to another plane of existence, causing immense damage and absorbing their power.

spell.name: Supernova
spell.description: Creates a supernova explosion that devastates everything in its path with stellar fire.

spell.name: Abyssal Maw
spell.description: Opens a giant maw to the deepest abyssal trenches, crushing the enemy with immense pressure and cold.

spell.name: World Tree
spell.description: Manifests the World Tree, the source of all life, providing extraordinary healing and life force.

spell.name: Hurricane Apocalypse
spell.description: Summons a world-ending hurricane that tears everything apart with wind, lightning, and devastation.

spell.name: Astral Projection
spell.description: Projects the caster's consciousness into the astral plane, making them nearly invulnerable and enhancing their magical abilities.

spell.name: Elemental Convergence
spell.description: Converges all elemental forces into a single devastating attack that overwhelms any defense.

spell.name: Lifeforce Manipulation
spell.description: Manipulates the very essence of life, transferring life force from the enemy to the caster.

spell.name: Glacial Age
spell.description: Brings forth a miniature ice age, freezing everything and causing catastrophic cold damage.

spell.name: Celestial Judgment
spell.description: Calls down judgment from celestial beings, devastating the enemy with divine power.

spell.name: Phase Shift
spell.description: Shifts the caster out of phase with normal reality, granting them extraordinary powers.

spell.name: Extinction Event
spell.description: Recreates the cataclysmic event that caused mass extinction, annihilating everything in its path.

spell.name: Galactic Rift
spell.description: Tears open a rift to the void between galaxies, subjecting the enemy to the unimaginable forces found there.

spell.name: Dimensional Collapse
spell.description: Collapses a small dimension onto the enemy, subjecting them to the catastrophic energy release.

spell.name: Omni-Elemental Fury
spell.description: Unleashes the fury of all elemental planes simultaneously in a devastating assault.

spell.name: Time Stop
spell.description: Completely stops time for everyone except the caster, allowing multiple actions without opposition.

spell.name: Cosmic Rebirth
spell.description: Causes the caster to be reborn in the fires of cosmic creation, fully restoring them and granting immense power.

spell.name: Primeval Force
spell.description: Channels the primeval forces of creation that shaped the world, devastating the enemy with unimaginable power.

spell.name: Divine Intervention
spell.description: Calls upon divine powers to intervene, completely restoring the caster and smiting their enemies.

spell.name: Reality Breach
spell.description: Creates a catastrophic breach in the fabric of reality, unleashing chaotic energies that devastate everything.

spell.name: Titanic Manifestation
spell.description: Manifests a titanic elemental being of immense power that fights alongside the caster.

spell.name: Universal Cataclysm
spell.description: Triggers a cataclysm on a universal scale, channeling the raw destructive power of cosmic apocalypse.

spell.name: Eternal Oblivion
spell.description: Consigns the enemy to eternal oblivion, a place beyond space and time where existence itself is erased.

spell.name: Multiversal Nexus
spell.description: Creates a nexus of infinite realities, subjecting the enemy to the simultaneous destructive forces of countless universes.

spell.name: Ascension
spell.description: Causes the caster to temporarily ascend to a higher plane of existence, gaining godlike powers.

spell.name: Primordial Genesis
spell.description: Taps into the primordial forces of creation that birthed the world, completely restoring and empowering the caster.

spell.name: Cosmic Reset
spell.description: Resets the caster's existence to a perfect state while devastating the enemy's.

spell.name: Transcendent Form
spell.description: Transforms the caster into a being of pure energy, transcending the limitations of physical form.

spell.name: Omega Blast
spell.description: Channels the power of the omega force, the ultimate destructive power in the multiverse.

spell.name: Celestial Maelstrom
spell.description: Summons a maelstrom of celestial proportions, channeling the destructive power of colliding galaxies.

spell.name: Chrono Disruption
spell.description: Disrupts the enemy's timeline, causing them to experience their demise from infinite different timelines simultaneously.

spell.name: Total Obliteration
spell.description: The ultimate destructive spell that completely obliterates the target from existence across all possible timelines and realities.

spell.name: Creation-Extinction Cycle
spell.description: Subjects the enemy to the full cycle of universal creation and extinction, billions of years of cosmic birth and death compressed into moments.

spell.name: Ultimate Reality
spell.description: Confronts the enemy with the ultimate reality that lies beyond all illusion, a truth so terrible it shatters mind, body, and soul.

spell.name: Godhead Manifestation
spell.description: The caster temporarily manifests as a divine being of unlimited power, transcending all limitations of mortal existence.

spell.name: Infinity
spell.description: Channels the concept of infinity itself, subjecting the enemy to endless iterations of destruction across infinite dimensions.

spell.name: Primordial One
spell.description: Returns the caster to the primordial state of the One that existed before creation, gaining the power that birthed all reality.

spell.name: Omnipotence
spell.description: Grants the caster temporary omnipotence, the state of unlimited power and ability to do anything.

spell.name: Heat Death
spell.description: Subjects the enemy to the heat death of the universe, the ultimate entropic end where all energy is exhausted.

spell.name: Big Bang
spell.description: Recreates the Big Bang, the primordial explosion that birthed the universe, focusing all its energy on the enemy.

spell.name: Singularity
spell.description: Creates a true singularity, a point of infinite density and zero volume, that consumes the enemy completely.

spell.name: Essence Theft
spell.description: Steals the essence of the enemy, healing the caster for a portion of the damage dealt.

spell.name: Astral Chain
spell.description: Binds the enemy with chains of astral energy, dealing damage and preventing them from using certain abilities.

spell.name: Magnetic Pulse
spell.description: Releases a concentrated magnetic pulse that damages enemies wearing metal armor more severely.

spell.name: Resonance Strike
spell.description: Strikes the enemy with a precisely tuned resonant frequency, bypassing shields and barriers.

spell.name: Honeyed Words
spell.description: A subtle enchantment that makes your words more persuasive, potentially avoiding combat entirely.

spell.name: Lifeblood Ritual
spell.description: A forbidden healing ritual that draws upon your own lifeforce to heal grievous wounds instantly.

spell.name: Elemental Harmony
spell.description: Harmonizes with the elements around you, granting resistance to all elemental damage for a short time.

spell.name: Rift Shatter
spell.description: Shatters the fabric between dimensions, causing chaotic arcane energy to flood the area and damage all enemies.

spell.name: Chrono Skip
spell.description: Skips forward in time momentarily, allowing you to avoid an incoming attack with certainty.

spell.name: Mirror Image
spell.description: Creates illusory duplicates of yourself that confuse enemies and absorb attacks.

spell.name: Eternal Winter
spell.description: Summons a fragment of eternal winter from the far north, freezing enemies solid and dealing severe cold damage over time.

spell.name: Soulshatter
spell.description: Attacks the very soul of the enemy, dealing damage proportional to their remaining health and weakening them severely.

spell.name: Dragonflame
spell.description: Channels the ancient fire of dragons, burning through all defenses and continuing to burn for several turns.

spell.name: Celestial Blessing
spell.description: Calls upon celestial forces to bless the caster, providing healing, protection, and enhanced magical abilities.

spell.name: Absolute Silence
spell.description: Envelops the enemy in a field of absolute silence where no magic can function, preventing them from casting spells.

spell.name: Plasma Storm
spell.description: Creates a swirling vortex of superheated plasma that deals massive damage to enemies caught within it.

spell.name: Runic Binding
spell.description: Inscribes ancient protective runes on the caster, granting exceptional defense against all forms of damage.

spell.name: Eldritch Barrier
spell.description: Creates a protective barrier of eldritch energy that absorbs damage and reflects a portion back to attackers.

spell.name: Insanity Whisper
spell.description: Whispers secrets of cosmic horror directly into the enemy's mind, causing them to attack themselves or allies in madness.

spell.name: World-Ending Flame
spell.description: Summons the primordial flame that will one day consume the world, dealing catastrophic damage to all enemies.

spell.name: Gaze of the Void
spell.description: Channels the incomprehensible power of the Void itself, potentially erasing enemies from existence.

spell.name: Singularity Nexus
spell.description: Creates a nexus of singularities that bend spacetime itself, dealing massive damage to all enemies and distorting reality.

spell.name: Ascendant Apotheosis
spell.description: Temporarily ascends the caster to a higher plane of existence, granting godlike power for a brief moment.

spell.name: Divine Judgment
spell.description: Calls down divine judgment upon enemies, dealing damage proportional to their misdeeds and evil within them.

spell.name: Summon Undead Minion
spell.description: Summons an undead minion to fight for you.

spell.name: Time Rewind
spell.description: Rewinds time to undo the last action.

spell.name: Time Stop
spell.description: Freezes time briefly, delaying enemy actions.

spell.name: Temporal Echo
spell.description: Creates an echo of your last spell.

spell.name: Weapon Enhancement
spell.description: Enhances your weapon with magical power.

spell.name: Blade Storm
spell.description: Creates a storm of magical blades.

spell.name: Combat Surge
spell.description: Grants temporary combat prowess.

spell.name: Mirror Image
spell.description: Creates illusory copies of yourself.

spell.name: Confusion
spell.description: Confuses the target, making them attack randomly.

spell.name: Phantasmal Force
spell.description: Creates a powerful illusion that causes real damage.

spell.name: Potion Throw
spell.description: Throws a damaging potion at the enemy.

spell.name: Dragon Breath
spell.description: A devastating cone of fire that burns everything in its path.

spell.name: Wing Blast
spell.description: A powerful gust of wind created by the dragon's massive wings.

spell.name: Void Blast
spell.description: A blast of pure void energy that erases matter from existence.

spell.name: Portal Strike
spell.description: Creates a portal that strikes the enemy from an unexpected angle.

spell.name: Growing Vines
spell.description: Summons massive vines that constrict and damage the enemy.

spell.name: Stone Blast
spell.description: Hurls massive boulders at the enemy.

spell.name: Lightning Strike
spell.description: A powerful bolt of lightning that can chain between enemies.

spell.name: Wind Slash
spell.description: A cutting blast of wind that can strike multiple times.

spell.name: Tidal Wave
spell.description: A massive wave of water that crashes down on the enemy.

spell.name: Abyssal Darkness
spell.description: Creates a sphere of darkness that drains the enemy's strength.

spell.name: Acid Splash
spell.description: Splashes acid on the target, dealing damage over time.

spell.name: Healing Elixir
spell.description: Creates a healing elixir that restores health over time.

spell.name: Death Bolt
spell.description: A bolt of dark energy that saps life force.

spell.name: Soul Drain
spell.description: Drains the target's soul, dealing damage and healing yourself.
